heisig_chinese_memo: The only thing that gives the miser a shread of happiness is cooking goose dishes and other tasty birds at home.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The only thing that give the miser a shread of happiness is cooking goose dishes and other tasty birds at home.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " bird " and " I ", the original meaning is home goose. Domestic goose is a poultry with white or gray feathers, orange or dark brown fleshy protrusions on the forehead, flat and broad mouth, long neck, short tail, large webbed feet, eating grains, grass, etc., meat and eggs for food. "Shuowen": "Bing and goose. From the bird to my voice." "Guanzi‧ Light and Heavy Armor": "The geese and swan's house is near, and the chicken and the wavy are far away."

" Goose " can also mean ancient military formations. "Twenty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Zhaogong": "Bingxu, fought against Fahrenheit at Ochre Hill. Zheng Pian was willing to be a stork, and his royal wish was a goose." Du's note: "Storks and gooses are both Chen's names." Later generations use "Goose Stork" "And raised the military formation. "Selected Works-Zhang Heng "Tokyo Fu"": "Fire List Juju, Samurai Star Shiki, Goose Stork Yuli, Ji Zhang Yishu."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " bird " and " I ", the original meaning is home goose.
humanum_full_description:
從「鳥」，「我」聲，本義是家鵝。家鵝屬家禽，羽毛白色或灰色，額部有橙黃色或黑褐色肉質突起，嘴扁而闊，頸長，尾短，腳大有蹼，食穀物、青草等，肉和卵供食用。《說文》：「鴚鵝也。从鳥，我聲。」 《管子‧輕重甲》：「鵝鶩之捨近，鵾雞鵠䳈之通遠。」

　　「鵝」也可表示古代軍陣。《左傳‧昭公二十一年》：「丙戌，與華氏戰於赭丘。鄭翩願為鸛，其御願為鵝。」杜預注：「鸛、鵝皆陳名。」後世以「鵝鸛」並舉指軍陣。《文選‧張衡〈東京賦〉》：「火列具舉，武士星敷，鵝鸛魚麗，箕張翼舒。」

Chinese: The only thing that gives the miser a shread of happiness is cooking goose dishes and other tasty birds at home.
Meaning: goose
Hanzi: 鹅
Story: The only thing that give the miser a shread of happiness is cooking goose dishes and other tasty birds at home.
Kind: traditional

從「 鳥 」，「 我 」聲，本義是家鵝。家鵝屬家禽，羽毛白色或灰色，額部有橙黃色或黑褐色肉質突起，嘴扁而闊，頸長，尾短，腳大有蹼，食穀物、青草等，肉和卵供食用。《說文》：「鴚鵝也。从鳥，我聲。」 《管子‧輕重甲》：「鵝鶩之捨近，鵾雞鵠䳈之通遠。」 「 鵝 」也可表示古代軍陣。《左傳‧昭公二十一年》：「丙戌，與華氏戰於赭丘。鄭翩願為鸛，其御願為鵝。」杜預注：「鸛、鵝皆陳名。」後世以「鵝鸛」並舉指軍陣。《文選‧張衡〈東京賦〉》：「火列具舉，武士星敷，鵝鸛魚麗，箕張翼舒。」
From the sound of " bird" and " I", the original meaning is home goose. Domestic goose is a poultry with white or gray feathers, orange or dark brown fleshy protrusions on the forehead, flat and broad mouth, long neck, short tail, large webbed feet, eating grains, grass, etc., meat and eggs for food. "Shuowen": "Bing and goose. From the bird to my voice." "Guanzi‧ Light and Heavy Armor": "The geese and swan's house is near, and the chicken and the wavy are far away." " Goose" can also mean ancient military formations. "Twenty-one Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Zhaogong": "Bingxu, fought against Fahrenheit at Ochre Hill. Zheng Pian was willing to be a stork, and his royal wish was a goose." Du's note: "Storks and gooses are both Chen's names." Later generations use "Goose Stork" "And raised the military formation. "Selected Works-Zhang Heng "Tokyo Fu"": "Fire List Juju, Samurai Star Shiki, Goose Stork Yuli, Ji Zhang Yishu."

鵝字的基本解释

鵝
é
见“鹅”。

鵝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［é］
［《廣韻》五何切，平歌，疑。］
“鹅1”的繁体字。亦作“鵞1”。亦作“1”。
(1)家禽，羽毛白色或灰色。额部有橙黄色或黑褐色肉质突起，嘴扁而阔，颈长，尾短，脚大有蹼，食谷物、青草等。肉和卵供食用。
(2)古阵名。参见“鵝鸛”。

鵝字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵝； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1490第31
〔古文〕䳗【唐韻】五何切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】牛何切，?音峩。【說文】鴚鵝也。長脰善鳴，峩首似傲，故曰鵝。【埤雅】鵝頸如瘤，今鵝江東呼鴚。李時珍曰：鵝綠眼黃喙紅掌，善?，夜鳴應更。禽經曰：脚近臎者能步，鵝騖是也。鵝見異類差翅鳴，一名家雁。一名舒雁。一名鵱鷜。又【爾雅·釋鳥】舒雁，鵝。【李巡曰】野曰雁，家曰鵝。【本草註】又有野鵝，大於雁，似人家蒼鵝，謂之鴐鵝。又【禽經】鵝鳴則蜮沉，養之圍林，則蛇遠去。又【嶺南異物志】蠻人聚鵝腹毳毛爲衣被。又【洞冥記】日出銜翅而舞，名喜白鵝。又陣名。【左傳·昭二十一年】鄭翩願爲鸛，其御願爲鵝。又人名。榮駕鵝，魯大夫成伯。又草名。黑鵝。【管子·地員篇】其種陵稻黑鵝馬夫。又鵝抱，亦草名。見【本草】。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [é]
["Guangyun" Five He Cuts, Ping Ge, Doubt. ]
Traditional characters for "goose 1". Also known as "鵞1". Also known as "1".
(1) Poultry, feathers are white or gray. There are orange-yellow or dark-brown fleshy protrusions on the forehead, flat and wide mouth, long neck, short tail, large webbed feet, eating grains, grass, etc. Meat and eggs are for food.
(2) The name of the ancient formation. See "Goose Stork".
Goose
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　 Goose; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1490 31
[Ancient text] Tong [Tang Yun] Five He Qi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Niu He Qi,? Yin Hua. [Said the text] Ye Ye also. Long 脰 is good at ming, and its head is like arrogant, so it is called goose. [Bian Ya] The neck of the goose is like a tumor, and today the Ejiang River is east of Huying. Li Shizhen said: Goose green eyes yellow beak anthurium, good? Yeming should be more. The Qin Jing said: Those who are close to the feet can walk, and so can the goose. The goose sees a different kind of wing, a house goose. A Shu Yan. A 鵱鷜. Also 【Erya·Shiniao】Shu Yan, goose. 【Li Xunyue】The wild is called the wild goose, the home is called the goose. [Notes on Materia Medica] There are also wild geese, which are larger than geese and resemble other people's grey geese. Also [Qing Jing] The sing of the geese will sink the mythical creature, and the encircling forest will cause the snake to go away. Also [Lingnan Foreign Body History] The barbarians gather goose belly velvet hair as a quilt. And [Dong Ming Ji] The sunrise dances with wings, the name is like the white goose. Also known as the formation. [Zuo Zhuan·21 Years of Zhao] Zheng Pian wished to be a stork, and his imperial wish was a goose. Another name. Rong drives a goose, and Doctor Lu becomes an uncle. Also cursive. Black goose. [Guanzi·Diploma] He grows Lingdao black goose horseman. Also hug the geese, also cursive name. See 【Materia Medica】.
